layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x272
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x272
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x248
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 161x18
          text run at (0,0) width 161: "TH VALIGN=BOTTOM"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,34) size 784x214 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 782x212
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x208
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (2,2) size 204x208 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutImage {img} at (2,2) size 200x200
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (208,152) size 572x58 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
